short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will pull data from a class or student page in a ReadTheory class and download it as a csv file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will download a csv of an entire class or student's ReadTheory data. 

The extension will only work on the "Class" or "Student" page at the urls https://readtheory.org/app/teacher/class/#######  
https://readtheory.org/teaching/studentReport######
